mapper.sql: select ID, BATCH_NO, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, CRT_TIME, CRT_NO, CRT_NAME, MOD_TIME, MOD_NO, MOD_NAME,STATUS, ARC_NO, ARC_NAME, ARC_TRANSFER, REMARK, TURN_IN_NO, TURN_IN_NAME, RECEIVE_NO, RECEIVE_NAME, RETURN_REASON, APPR_INFO_ID, RESP_DEPA_NAME, RESP_OP_NAME, ARC_CODE, ARC_NUM, ARC_PAGE_NUM, ARC_LEVEL, ARC_CRE_TIME, FILING_DEPA, VAL_PERIOD, THEME_SPEECH, CUTTING, LANGUAGE, CARRIER, OTHER_NAME, FORWARD_NO, FORWARD_NAME, RECEIPT_NO, ETC, ETC_NUM, PRACT_TYPE, PRACT_DESC, EDITION, AFOUR_NUM, ARC_TEXT, ORIGIN_TYPE, SAVE_ADDRESS, MEDEL_TYPE, MEDEL_CODE, FILING_TIME, EXPENSE_INVOLVE, ARC_BILL, ARC_FORMAT, ORIGIN_MODE, ARC_ABSTRACT, RESP_DEPA_CODE, RESP_OP_CODE, ARC_BILL_CODE, FILING_DEPA_CODE, ARC_BILL_DEPT, ARC_BILL_DEPT_CODE, CONFER_INS, RECEIVE_INS, PHOTO_NO, NEGATIVES_NO, PHOTOGRAPHER, INDEX_MARK, BILL, ARC_DESC, ARC_COPYRIGHT, ARC_LAYOUT, SERVICE_TYPE, KEY_WORD, RECEIVING_OPINION, box_op_code, box_op_name, box_org_code, box_org_name, box_id, UPDATE_PATH, VIEW_PATH, EXPENSE, REASON, IS_NO_MEDIUM, CAPTION, DURATION, business_start_time, business_end_time, STORAGE_LOCATION, TURN_IN_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME,RECEIVING_TIME ,total_transactions,arc_has_move_bank,people_name,people_card,busi_no,COUNTERPART from ams_batch

select b.ID, b.BATCH_NO, b.ORG_CODE, b.ORG_NAME, b.CRT_TIME, b.CRT_NO,b.arc_has_move_bank, b.CRT_NAME, b.MOD_TIME, b.MOD_NO, b.MOD_NAME,b.STATUS, b.ARC_NO, b.ARC_NAME, b.ARC_TRANSFER, b.REMARK, b.TURN_IN_NO, b.TURN_IN_NAME, b.RECEIVE_NO, b.RECEIVE_NAME, b.RETURN_REASON, b.APPR_INFO_ID, b.RESP_DEPA_NAME, b.RESP_OP_NAME, b.ARC_CODE, b.ARC_NUM, b.ARC_PAGE_NUM, b.ARC_LEVEL, b.ARC_CRE_TIME, b.FILING_DEPA, b.VAL_PERIOD, b.THEME_SPEECH, b.CUTTING, b.LANGUAGE, b.CARRIER, b.OTHER_NAME, b.FORWARD_NO, b.FORWARD_NAME, b.RECEIPT_NO, b.ETC, b.ETC_NUM, b.PRACT_TYPE, b.PRACT_DESC, b.EDITION, b.AFOUR_NUM, b.ARC_TEXT, r.REG_OP_NAME, b.ARC_BILL,r.REG_TIME from ams_batch b LEFT JOIN ams_arc_reg r ON b.ARC_NO=r.ID
mapper.select: select ORG_NAME from ams_batch group by ORG_NAME

SELECT ORG_NAME orgName, GROUP_CONCAT(ARC_BILL) arcBill, GROUP_CONCAT(num) arcNum FROM (SELECT ORG_NAME, ARC_BILL, COUNT(ARC_BILL) AS num, ARC_BILL_CODE FROM ams_batch WHERE ORG_NAME = #{orgName} AND STATUS >= 3 AND STATUS <=5 GROUP BY ARC_BILL, ORG_NAME, ARC_BILL_CODE) a GROUP BY ORG_NAME
mapper.insert:
insert into ams_batch
ID, BATCH_NO, ORG_CODE, ORG_NAME, CRT_TIME, CRT_NO, CRT_NAME, MOD_TIME, MOD_NO, MOD_NAME, STATUS, ARC_NO, ARC_NAME, ARC_TRANSFER, REMARK, TURN_IN_NO, TURN_IN_NAME, RECEIVE_NO, RECEIVE_NAME, RETURN_REASON, APPR_INFO_ID, RESP_DEPA_NAME, RESP_OP_NAME, ARC_CODE, ARC_NUM, ARC_PAGE_NUM, ARC_LEVEL, ARC_CRE_TIME, total_transactions, FILING_DEPA, VAL_PERIOD, THEME_SPEECH, CUTTING, LANGUAGE, CARRIER, OTHER_NAME, FORWARD_NO, FORWARD_NAME, RECEIPT_NO, ETC, ETC_NUM, PRACT_TYPE, PRACT_DESC, EDITION, AFOUR_NUM, ARC_TEXT, ORIGIN_TYPE, SAVE_ADDRESS, MEDEL_TYPE, MEDEL_CODE, FILING_TIME, EXPENSE_INVOLVE, ARC_BILL, ARC_FORMAT, ORIGIN_MODE, ARC_ABSTRACT, RESP_DEPA_CODE, RESP_OP_CODE, ARC_BILL_CODE, FILING_DEPA_CODE, ARC_BILL_DEPT, ARC_BILL_DEPT_CODE, CONFER_INS, RECEIVE_INS, PHOTO_NO, NEGATIVES_NO, PHOTOGRAPHER, INDEX_MARK, BILL, ARC_DESC, ARC_COPYRIGHT, ARC_LAYOUT, SERVICE_TYPE, KEY_WORD, RECEIVING_OPINION, box_op_code, box_op_name, box_org_code, box_org_name, box_id, UPDATE_PATH, VIEW_PATH, EXPENSE, REASON, IS_NO_MEDIUM, CAPTION, DURATION, business_start_time, business_end_time, RECEIVING_TIME, STORAGE_LOCATION, TURN_IN_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, arc_has_move_bank, people_name, people_card, busi_no, COUNTERPART,
#{id}, #{batchNo}, #{orgCode}, #{orgName}, #{crtTime}, #{crtNo}, #{crtName}, #{modTime}, #{modNo}, #{modName}, #{status}, #{arcNo}, #{arcName}, #{arcTransfer}, #{remark}, #{turnInNo}, #{turnInName}, #{receiveNo}, #{receiveName}, #{returnReason}, #{apprInfoId}, #{respDepaName}, #{respOpName}, #{arcCode}, #{arcNum}, #{arcPageNum}, #{arcLevel}, #{arcCreTime}, #{totalTransactions}, #{filingDepa}, #{valPeriod}, #{themeSpeech}, #{cutting}, #{language}, #{carrier}, #{otherName}, #{forwardNo}, #{forwardName}, #{receiptNo}, #{eTC}, #{etcNum}, #{practType}, #{practDesc}, #{edition}, #{afourNum}, #{arcText}, #{originType}, #{saveAddress}, #{medelType}, #{medelCode}, #{filingTime}, #{expenseInvolve}, #{arcBill}, #{arcFormat}, #{originMode}, #{arcAbstract}, #{respDepaCode}, #{respOpCode}, #{arcBillCode}, #{filingDepaCode}, #{arcBillDept}, #{arcBillDeptCode}, #{conferIns}, #{receiveIns}, #{photoNo}, #{negativesNo}, #{photographer}, #{indexMark}, #{bill}, #{arcDesc}, #{arcCopyright}, #{arcLayout}, #{serviceType}, #{keyWord}, #{receivingOpinion}, #{boxOpCode}, #{boxOpName}, #{boxOrgCode}, #{boxOrgName}, #{boxId}, #{updatePath}, #{viewPath}, #{expense}, #{reason}, #{isNoMedium}, #{caption}, #{duration}, #{businessStartTime}, #{businessEndTime}, #{receivingTime}, #{storageLocation}, #{turnInTime}, #{receiveTime}, #{arcHasMoveBank}, #{peopleName}, #{peopleCard}, #{busiNo}, #{counterpart},
mapper.update:
update ams_batch
BATCH_NO = #{batchNo}, ORG_CODE = #{orgCode}, ORG_NAME = #{orgName}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime}, CRT_NO = #{crtNo}, CRT_NAME = #{crtName}, MOD_TIME = #{modTime}, total_transactions = #{totalTransactions},
MOD_NO = #{modNo}, MOD_NAME = #{modName}, STATUS = #{status}, ARC_NO = #{arcNo}, ARC_NAME = #{arcName}, ARC_TRANSFER = #{arcTransfer}, REMARK = #{remark}, TURN_IN_NO = #{turnInNo}, TURN_IN_NAME = #{turnInName}, RECEIVE_NO = #{receiveNo}, RECEIVE_NAME = #{receiveName}, RETURN_REASON = #{returnReason}, APPR_INFO_ID = #{apprInfoId}, RESP_DEPA_NAME = #{respDepaName}, RESP_OP_NAME = #{respOpName}, ARC_CODE = #{arcCode}, ARC_NUM = #{arcNum}, ARC_PAGE_NUM = #{arcPageNum}, ARC_LEVEL = #{arcLevel}, ARC_CRE_TIME = #{arcCreTime}, FILING_DEPA = #{filingDepa}, VAL_PERIOD = #{valPeriod}, THEME_SPEECH = #{themeSpeech}, CUTTING = #{cutting}, LANGUAGE = #{language}, CARRIER = #{carrier}, OTHER_NAME = #{otherName}, FORWARD_NO = #{forwardNo}, FORWARD_NAME = #{forwardName}, RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo}, ETC = #{eTC}, ETC_NUM = #{etcNum}, PRACT_TYPE = #{practType}, PRACT_DESC = #{practDesc}, EDITION = #{edition}, AFOUR_NUM = #{afourNum}, ARC_TEXT = #{arcText}, ORIGIN_TYPE = #{originType}, SAVE_ADDRESS = #{saveAddress}, MEDEL_TYPE = #{medelType}, MEDEL_CODE = #{medelCode}, FILING_TIME = #{filingTime}, EXPENSE_INVOLVE = #{expenseInvolve}, ARC_BILL = #{arcBill}, ARC_FORMAT = #{arcFormat}, ORIGIN_MODE = #{originMode}, ARC_ABSTRACT = #{arcAbstract}, RESP_DEPA_CODE = #{respDepaCode}, RESP_OP_CODE = #{respOpCode}, ARC_BILL_CODE = #{arcBillCode}, FILING_DEPA_CODE = #{filingDepaCode}, ARC_BILL_DEPT = #{arcBillDept}, ARC_BILL_DEPT_CODE = #{arcBillDeptCode}, CONFER_INS = #{conferIns}, RECEIVE_INS = #{receiveIns}, PHOTO_NO = #{photoNo}, NEGATIVES_NO = #{negativesNo}, PHOTOGRAPHER = #{photographer}, INDEX_MARK = #{indexMark}, BILL = #{bill}, ARC_DESC = #{arcDesc}, ARC_COPYRIGHT = #{arcCopyright}, ARC_LAYOUT = #{arcLayout}, SERVICE_TYPE = #{serviceType}, KEY_WORD = #{keyWord}, RECEIVING_OPINION = #{receivingOpinion}, box_op_code = #{boxOpCode}, box_op_name = #{boxOpName}, box_org_code = #{boxOrgCode}, box_org_name = #{boxOrgName}, box_id = #{boxId}, UPDATE_PATH = #{updatePath}, VIEW_PATH = #{viewPath}, EXPENSE = #{expense}, REASON = #{reason}, IS_NO_MEDIUM = #{isNoMedium}, CAPTION = #{caption}, DURATION = #{duration}, business_start_time = #{businessStartTime}, business_end_time = #{businessEndTime}, RECEIVING_TIME = #{receivingTime}, STORAGE_LOCATION = #{storageLocation}, TURN_IN_TIME= #{turnInTime}, RECEIVE_TIME = #{receiveTime}, arc_has_move_bank = #{arcHasMoveBank}, people_name = #{peopleName}, people_card = #{peopleCard}, busi_no = #{busiNo}, COUNTERPART = #{counterpart},
where ID = #{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from ams_batch where ID in
#{id}
mapper.select:
and ORG_CODE = #{orgCode} and ORG_NAME = #{orgName} and to_char(CRT_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(#{crtTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and to_char(CRT_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_char(#{crtTimeStart}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and to_char(CRT_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(#{crtTimeEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and total_transactions = #{totalTransactions}
and CRT_NO = #{crtNo} and CRT_NAME like concat(concat('%', #{crtName}), '%') and MOD_NAME = #{modName} and STATUS = #{status} and ARC_NAME like concat(concat('%', #{arcName}), '%') and RESP_OP_NAME like concat(concat('%', #{respOpName}), '%')
and ARC_CODE like concat(concat('%', #{arcCode}), '%') and ARC_NUM like concat(concat('%', #{arcNum}), '%') and ARC_PAGE_NUM like concat(concat('%', #{arcPageNum}), '%') and ARC_LEVEL = #{arcLevel} and to_char(ARC_CRE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') = to_char(#{arcCreTime},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and to_char(ARC_CRE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_char(#{arcCreTimeStart},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and to_char(ARC_CRE_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(#{arcCreTimeEnd},'yyyy-mm-dd')
and VAL_PERIOD = #{valPeriod} and PRACT_TYPE = #{practType} and EXPENSE_INVOLVE = #{expenseInvolve} and ARC_BILL = #{arcBill} and ARC_FORMAT = #{arcFormat} and ORIGIN_MODE = #{originMode} and CONFER_INS like concat(concat('%', #{conferIns}), '%')
and RECEIVE_INS like concat(concat('%', #{receiveIns}), '%')
and PHOTO_NO like concat(CONCAT('%', #{photoNo}), '%') and PHOTOGRAPHER like concat(CONCAT('%', #{photographer}), '%')
and to_char(RECEIVING_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_char(#{receivingTimeStart}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and to_char(RECEIVING_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd') <= to_char(#{receivingTimeEnd}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and BILL = #{bill} and IS_NO_MEDIUM = #{isNoMedium} and CAPTION like concat(concat('%', #{caption}), '%') and ARC_TRANSFER LIKE concat(concat('%',#{arcTransfer}),'%')
and STATUS in (2,3,4,5,6) and arc_has_move_bank='1'
ORDER BY CRT_TIME DESC
